channel.title: Wildy disconnection
channel.description:
everytime i pick something up in wildy i get disconnected please help!
ANY HELP WILL DO! PLEASE!
skype: ryanterryphillips

item.title: Wildy disconnection
item.dc:creator: @ryanphillips ryanphillips
item.description:
@ryanphillips wrote:

i get this error everytime i try pick up someones loot who i’ve killed! although if i’m standing on their loot i can pick it up then?!

java.lang.ArryIndexOutOfBoundsException: -14336 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:15274) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17501) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:271) at java.lang.Thread.run(Uknown Source) ClientHandler: Client Test disconnect (host**-***-***-***.range81-151.btcentralplus.com)

Read full topic

item.title: Wildy disconnection
item.dc:creator: @ryanphillips ryanphillips
item.description:
@ryanphillips wrote:

The Web Guy:

Sounds like a problem with the goodDistance() method, which basically creates a limit to how close/far you have to be from an object/item to interact with it. Checkout your method for picking up items. This is the wrong section though, create a thread in development teams.

thanks!, ill try do something in here!

Read full topic

item.title: Wildy disconnection
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Sounds like a problem with the goodDistance() method, which basically creates a limit to how close/far you have to be from an object/item to interact with it. Checkout your method for picking up items. This is the wrong section though, create a thread in development teams.
